Posts.Content: I hope you have good news, keep positive!
Posts.Title: The waiting game

Posts.Content: I noticed in your message you are a survivor. So happy for you. I'm just beginning. I have invasive ductal carcinoma best cancer Stage 1 grade 3. I've had a lumpectumy and radiation completed at time of surgery lympnodes were clear. Now waiting 4 weeks on ONCA test to come back. Wanted to hear your story?
Posts.Title: Scared!! Need inspiration

Posts.Content: Diagnosed in July, lumpectumy October26th, now waiting on the results of the ONCA test. Lymph nodes clear, surgeon said she got it all but chemo doctor is sure that I will need chemo. I wonder is it because I have the kind that speads?
Posts.Title: RE: invasive ductal carcinoma

Posts.Content: I'm so happy for her, that truly gives me encouragement. Not sure what NED means. How soon did all the treatments start? Seems like I'm waiting forever?Â
